body: Well the artwork was quite good IMO. Even though I don't usually go for cow tits. But that where it ends. The story and sex was VERY monotonous. You read one story you know how ALL of them are going to go. BORING.
There is 14 in a single page, and it's not even that fucking good, how is this even allowed?
this got posted 18 times already.. wtf
How many times was this posted already?
Nice analysis but I just love all the splashy cum tbh

It's sad what happened to the guy from page 145. Lost everything for no good reason. I mean this has happened in japan. The false charges part not the electrifying sex part ( that I know of ). I mean in my home country there was a guy who was falsely charged of this, lost his job and spent years in jail. The first thing that he did after he was released was to track her down, PROPERLY rape her this time and Fucking killed her in cold blood because other than his life he had nothing left to lose. Not saying it's poetic justice but I had no sympathy for the woman.
